chemistryFields.name: Inorganic Chemistry
chemistryFields.description: Study of non-organic compounds, including metals, minerals, and organometallic compounds, focusing on their properties, structures, and reactions.

chemistryFields.name: Organic Chemistry
chemistryFields.description: Study of carbon-containing compounds, their structures, properties, reactions, and synthesis, focusing on hydrocarbons and their derivatives.

chemistryFields.name: Physical Chemistry
chemistryFields.description: The study of the physical properties and behaviors of chemical systems.

chemistryFields.name: BioChemistry
chemistryFields.description: Study of chemical processes within living organisms, including metabolism, enzyme function, and molecular biology, focusing on biomolecules.

chemistryFields.name: Analytical Chemistry
chemistryFields.description: The study of the chemical processes and substances that occur within living organisms.
